# Memory Allocation Options

**API Collection**

Constants used to control behavior when allocating or reallocating collectible memory.

## Overview

These constants are used as components in a bitfield to specify the behavior of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAllocateCollectable] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSReallocateCollectable].

## Constants

- **NSScannedOption**: Specifies allocation of scanned memory.
- **NSCollectorDisabledOption**: Specifies that the block is retained, and therefore ineligible for collection. Specifying this option is equivalent to invoking [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSGarbageCollector/disableCollectorForPointer:] with the returned block as the argument.

## Legacy
